author: rahuls
msg: include-ignorable-whitespace feature is relevant only when the grammar is DTD.

author: andyc
msg: Improved handling of settings in parser classes making it easier
to re-use the parsers with other parser configurations. Previously,
the parser instances assumed that all configurations supported
various settings (i.e. the parser would set default values without
first adding the recognized features and property identifiers to

author: andyc
msg: Fixed bug in HTML DOM implementation that was causing xerces.dom
element nodes to be created instead of the appropriate HTML element

author: andyc
msg: Fixed bug to avoid null pointer exception in AbstractDOMParser
when locator information is not available from parser config.

author: elena
msg: Modified features according to the 09 April draft.
